Name: Currant (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Sommer. Wächst in 8 Tagen zu einem Johannisbeerenstrauch heran. Kann mehrmals geerntet werden.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте летом. Через 8 дней вырастает куст смородины, который и после первого сбора будет продолжать плодоносить.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Plant these in the summer. Takes 8 days to mature into a currant bush. Continues to produce after their first harvest.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 夏天种植。 需要8天才能成熟成红加仑丛。 在第一次收获后继续结果。
